thread.title: Sammy Kuffour was misled into granting interview that could cost him Kotoko job Anthony Baffoe
thread.title_full: Sammy Kuffour was misled into granting interview that could cost him Kotoko job Anthony Baffoe

title: Sammy Kuffour was misled into granting interview that could cost him Kotoko job Anthony Baffoe
text:
15:55 CET Sammy Kuffour was misled into granting interview that could cost him Kotoko job â€“ Anthony Baffoe - www.ghanasoccernet.com Otumfuo Osei Tutu II could snub Kuffour 
Anthony Baffoe says Samuel Osei Kuffour was ill-advised into granting an interview about his plans for Asante Kotoko even before his appointment as 'President' is made official. 
The former Bayern Munich star has been left in a limbo as to whether he will indeed be handed the club as he claimed in an interview with Accra-based Metro TV. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
